website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for a classic bride who’s looking for a sense of flair, these rhinestone-adorned heels are a stylish and stellar value.
pros: Comfortable 3” heel with a stylish open-toe front
Small elastic band inside to help secure foot for easy walking and dancing
Shiny satin and sparkly rhinestones give shoes a fancy look for the special occasion
cons: These shoes are not available in half sizes

customer_reviews.title: I’M IN LOVE! Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 9.5. My right foot is ever so slightly smaller than the left so since they don’t have 9.5, I ordered a 10. They fit perfectly on the left and slightly big on the right. They also sent pads and extra heel soles. I put the pads in the right one and it made the fit better. I also love how they have the expansive backing for a better fit. Can’t wait to wear these at my wedding. The heel is also the perfect height and not tall so I feel I can keep them on a little longer than the ceremony.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great wedding shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I got these in blue for my wedding shoes and they were a big hit! Lots of compliments on them throughout the day and the photographers got some cool shots with them. BUT they need to be broken in! The toes pinched me a lot, so I needed to wear them around the house and do the blow dryer trick. So keep that in mind for timing. They aren’t super comfortable, but manageable for heels.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Crosby

customer_reviews.title: True Ivory
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! It was getting really hard to find ivory shoes that are actually ivory instead of stark white. These were the 6th pair I bought online and I finally got exactly what I was looking for. I usually like a higher heel, but these look great on and they're so incredibly comfortable, I was willing to trade the heel for some comfort for my wedding day. They are beautifully vintage and they're more sparkley than the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Barbra Chambers

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are beautiful. However
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful. However, I am a size 7.5, and since the shoes don't come in half sizes, I had to choose the 8. When I received them, I tried them on and they were HUGE. I kept them, just in case, but even with filler and padding, it was too big. So, I'm going to send it back and order them again in size 7. So, order at least one size smaller :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not true to color
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive my shoes and when I got them I went straight to open them up and try them on. They fit decently, they were a little big which is what I wanted so I could put cushions in, I'm a size 7 1\2-8 and ordered an 8. The color, however, will not work. I needed a deep red and these were HOT PINK! It's very upsetting because they would have been perfect but the color was not right. The images are not true to color either. I will be returning. While the shoes seem to be good quality, they're useless to me as is.
customer_reviews.author: ambero

customer_reviews.title: Half Sizes round up to the next size!
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous shoes! I am SO happy I bought them! I was nervous that the heel would be really high and I would have trouble moving around in these shoes but upon receiving my pair I found that they are actually more of a pump and very comfortable. I am a 9.5 with wide feet. That said, I rounded up and ordered a size 10. The shoes hug my feet perfectly! They do not fall off but they also are not too tight for my foot. However, the shoes do come with inserts for those who may need them to improve the fit. I highly recommend these shoes! They truly are elegant and very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Just as beautiful as pictured and comfortable fit. Can't wait till my wedding to walk these down the aisle.
customer_reviews.author: Ann K.

customer_reviews.title: Larger sizes not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe, perfect for my ivory dress unfortunately the larger sizes don't seem to have the same "too big" fit issue as smaller sizes. I am a 10-11 US so I ordered the 11 to be cautious & they are too snug to be comfortable all day with the amount of standing, walking & dancing I'll be doing. They match my dress perfectly though so I've ordered a shoe stretcher & really hoping I can make these work.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Had a 10 pound dress on all day for pictures and all night for reception. Only took these shoes off for 1 hour in an 11 hour period. They were very comfy! Of course some pain towards the end but I was running, jumping, dancing nonstop in them during reception. Really, for a 3 inch heel, they were excellent! A small tip: I took 2 tablets of motrin before reception because my back was aching from the heavy dress and I think it also contributed to holding off the pain to my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Anne James

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: So since these shoes don’t come in half sizes i got a size smaller. I’m usually a 9.5 and got a 9. Length of the shoe was fine but the width in from was a bit tight for me. So to help fix that problem i purchased a shoe stretcher and it has helped so much! These shoes are beautiful and everyone loves them. I plan to wear them on my wedding day! Definitely worth every penny which wasn’t much compared to the prices of other wedding shoes on the market. And the height is great! I’m very tall so i like smaller heels.
customer_reviews.author: Fadul Bambino

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are gorgeous. They fit very comfortable although I haven't worn them for a long period. I'm going to order them in two other colors. Wow! This was definitely a good buy. Update: I bought another pair in burgundy. It wasn't as dark as it showed on the website, but it definitely looks classy. No regrets. I think these shoes are well worth the price. I'd buy another one if I had something to wear them with.
customer_reviews.author: hondutel

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect gorgeous shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just wore these shoes in black to a wedding. I was the mother of the bride. I cannot say enough about these shoes except absolutely perfect. I wear an 8 and that's the size i ordered fit was perfect. I received so many compliments. So comfortable i just wish i was going somewhere else bc i would buy these but in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A.

customer_reviews.title: Ivory... not white.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are gorgeous and would be otherwise perfect if "white" meant wedding white. Unfortunately, the shoes are definitely ivory. Normally this wouldn't matter but when you're dealing with what are clearly wedding shoes... the difference between white and ivory is a big deal. They are beautiful and well made and fit great but they look dirty next to my dress. Good thing no one is going to see them anyway but it would have been nice to know that they don't mean paper white on a wedding item.
customer_reviews.author: LLT

customer_reviews.title: I am not really good with wearing heels but these are only 3 inches
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wedding day, when I got them I couldn't wait to try them on. I am not really good with wearing heels but these are only 3 inches, I have put them on a couple times walking around the house, they are comfortable (which I never thought I would say about heels) and fit my foot perfectly and they are absolutely beautiful! I can't wait till my wedding day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and the price. I am thinking about changing the color of the dress that I am wearing and if I do I will certainly repurchase these shoes in a matching color. The fit of the shoe is great too...As I am a size 11, it's usually the box that fits better! It was great to know that I can have a shoe that will look this nice and still be very comfortable. The packing was done very nicely too...
customer_reviews.author: BCS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wedding Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I wear sizes 7-8, depending on the shoe/brand so I chose an 8 for this one. It fit almost perfectly, but the manufacturer was kind enough to add little heel inserts, as well as orthotics for the balls of the feet, to make sure the shoe was as comfortable as possible! The color is lovely and the quality is truly better than I thought I would get for the price and from an online store. I am SO excited to wear these to my wedding in May :) Thanks, Elegant Park!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Melara

customer_reviews.title: THE COLOR DOES NOT MATCH PHOTO
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE NOT RED. I wanted so badly for them to look exactly like the photo but they are definitely not red, they are for sure burgundy. Still very pretty and not that worried about the color since no one will even see the under my wedding dress. But if you’re looking for a true red, these are NOT your shoe.
customer_reviews.author: EliSal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wedding shoe
customer_reviews.text: After trying on multiple pairs of Badgley Mischka's, I ended up wearing these for my wedding. They were perfect and fit very well. There's a small elastic band on the inside of the heel, which made them feel secure walking around and on the dance floor. The rhinestones on the side or kind of stung together rather than individually sewn on, but you can't tell unless looking very closely. The heel was also the exact height I needed - not too tall to be uncomfortable or taller than my groom, but more sophisticated than a kitten heel. I also loved the open-toe look, which kept it from being too serious.
customer_reviews.author: wake47

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous! I love them! They come with pads and extra pads for heals. They shine and are clean. I wear a size 7.5. I ordered up because I see some ladies saying you have to break them in or toes scrunch up. They fit me perfect. It depends on the feet and width of toes. I had some room but not much to tumble over or the heel to fall off. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: The overall fit of the product was Ok, however it looked very cheap. The rhinestones in the pictures look nice, however up close and in person look cheap and poor quality. Returned them. I was looking for wedding shoes and these just didn't look that classy.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Got sooo many compliments on these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my daughter's wedding and they were comfortable during the entire event! They come with inserts to help make them fit better, if needed. They are beautiful and fun. The heel is not too high, but gives your legs a longer look. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Liz M.

customer_reviews.title: Not  a wide width
customer_reviews.text: I adored the way they looked and they looked perfect on my feet. I usually wear a wide width dress shoe and these are not wide width. I wore them for a while in the house and I felt my toes being squeezed. I decided I do not want to go through the night in pain so I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: joan mule

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not great for all night long events.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is gorgeous there's no doubt about that however although it fit, adter wearing them for an hour you'll start to feel the pain. Its a little tight at the front and gets worst the longer you have them on. id recommend a size up
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but a little small for wife feet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were absolutely gorgeous and excellent quality. I have wide feet so unfortunately they were a little to small for me. If you have wide feet I would recommend ordering a half size up if you can. I hope you find this review helpful. Please let me know if you do.
customer_reviews.author: Kryzzle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! I absolutely love these shoes I bought for ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I absolutely love these shoes I bought for my upcoming wedding. They are so comfortable, fit great, and are really beautiful! The heel is the perfect height as well. The seller included some comfort gels and extra heel tips which I thought was a really nice touch. Very pleased with these!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Absolute beautiful shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful for the price. The appliqués are not real rhinestones, but you cannot tell unless you are holding the shoe up very close to your eyes. The craftsmanship is perfect and the company is very generous in providing extra heel tips as well as padding for the shoes. Well-made and perfect for the occasion
customer_reviews.author: NOLA Native

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Although these shoes are beautiful, I could not wear them longer than an hour. I had to remove them at my wedding and go barefoot. They cut into toes and I had blisters from only an hour of wear.
customer_reviews.author: swal31

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the most uncomfortable shoe I have ever tried on! They were so narrow and tight. I had red marks on my feet after 30 seconds of wearing them. The jewels were almost completely falling off. For how expensive they were I expected way more.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: I liked them
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were for my son’s wedding. And while they matched my dress perfectly, the shoes lacked enough sole cushion to be worn all day. Still a beautiful shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Veracious Reader

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful shoe. Lovely pink satin. Comes with an extra padding for the ball of the foot and inserts to use if they slide on the heel. Also, extra heel tips. Unfortunately, they were just too big. I have a wide foot, and these fit across the toe well. I am going to try a half size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesotagma

customer_reviews.title: These are so great!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are Ah-mazing! I have gotten so many positive comments on how beautiful they are. The color, the quality and the comfort are superb! I did have to get a size smaller than I normally wear so watch out for that. I am wearing these for my wedding and I'm so glad i gave myself enough time to send them back and order a different size. The return was easy and I had a new pair by the next week! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, perfect height!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wedding and I’m so so pleased! When I ordered my gown they asked me how high my shoes were going to be because they would have the dress pre-altered to height, and I just said I was wearing 3-3 1/2” heels without really thinking about it. It turns out all the typical “event” shoes are made with 4” heels. It was a project to find anything attractive in the right heel height range. Goodbye Badgley Mischka, hello ElegantPark! These shoes are GORGEOUS, the perfect height, and surprisingly comfortable. They even came with extra cushions/heel padding for more comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wider than most shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet so I was expecting them to be a little tight, but they were actually too wide even for me. The portion that covers the toes stops short of your pad so it doesn't really hold your foot in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity Lindley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but half a size too big!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 6.5 in heels but I got a 7 just to be safe than sorry. I am going to put in thicker gel pads to push my feet back a bit and replace the back “sticker” or anti-slip thingy. I love it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Zuercher

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shoes but no half sizes
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoes, beautiful color and bling. Bought in a 9 which was too large so I returned and purchased and 8, which is too small. I wish there were half sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Kace D.

customer_reviews.title: I loved these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes, but the color did not match well with my ivory colored dress, the shoes were more white. So I had to return. The shoes were beautiful and comfortable. I did order 1/2 size up. Don't be afraid to order.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda N.

customer_reviews.title: Noooo thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I had to wear these for my friend's wedding and I was in horrible pain the whole time! I hate them! They are pretty but good Lord not worth the pain! I gave them away they were so bad.
customer_reviews.author: heather-dawn garrett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shoes for my wedding and they are perfect! I used the sizing guide and bought the size recommended and they fit great! Can't wait to wear them on my wedding day!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I bought them to wear for my wedding, and I am very excited to wear them. They came with extra heel pads on case you need to replace them and came with nonslip pads and adhesive strips to put on the back of your heels so they don't rub. But I don't think I will have a problem with them rubbing. I was worried with some reviews saying they were cheaply made, but I don't think they look cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fejfar

customer_reviews.title: Looked great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I looked for blue shoes for my wedding for months. I kept coming back to these and they were exactly right. Everyone loved them! I did wear them around the house to break them in and they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Taykait

customer_reviews.title: Loveee
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Since there are no half sizes I had to go up to a 7, but they aren't too big. They are supper comfortable and the perfect height. I added a comfort cushion strip to the back of the shoe for extra support and tighter fit when I walk. Size 6 would have been way too small. Overall Love these!!
customer_reviews.author: Christal Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Bummer as they are super cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered larger than I usually wear and they were still too small. Bummer as they are super cute shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana

customer_reviews.title: Nice style
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 41 wide or 42. I got the 41 cause they didn't have 42 in white. It was way too narrow. Lovely style though. Truly disappointed I couldn't wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Purple kitty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful, my daughter wore for her wedding. They were a little large, but was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful! And it came with extra tidbits: 2nd set of plastic heel parts, self set ball of foot gel stickers, heel pads for anti blisters! I'm so pleased! Can't wait to wear these on my big day!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little big, but looked great with my wedding dress!! I added shoe inserts to make it fit, so it worked.. very comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but too small
customer_reviews.text: They are sooo pretty but the 11s fit like a 10! Super tight around the toes. I’m so sad. They are so nice but I can’t handle it. Big foot? Order size up!
customer_reviews.author: ShannieC

customer_reviews.title: Beware of sizing concerns
customer_reviews.text: Looked like a decent made shoe & very pretty but it was too big in the heel, even with the inserts. I had to send them back
customer_reviews.author: Triscuit

customer_reviews.title: but just used a tad bit of super glue, let it dry and it was perfect
customer_reviews.text: One of the gems wasn't sewn in a way that it laid flat, but just used a tad bit of super glue, let it dry and it was perfect. My feet didn't hurt at all and I had to stand for over an hour before the ceremony stated since guests arrived early.
customer_reviews.author: acmarie

customer_reviews.title: Wedding shoes, loved them
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for my wedding, SO happy with how they looked and I was able to wear them all night
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Monnin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, not SUPER comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable for my big toe but they’re really pretty! I got some shoe inserts to make up for that and will be wearing them for my wedding. They do actually come with some padding inserts too.
customer_reviews.author: Torey

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Even though the shoe is a little large, I don't want to return it. I recieved so many compliments on it The shoe is absolutely beautiful. I am taking it to a shoe shop to see if they can fit them to my size.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Robinson

customer_reviews.title: NOT True to size
customer_reviews.text: So, these are NOT true to size. I am a regular 11 in dress shoes (I can wear a 10.5 in normal shoes/boots), and these shoes are tight as all hell. I am returning them immediately, completely dissatisfied. Well, they are very pretty, but that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Low heel, runs large-gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous, but they were too low of a heel for my wedding dress. I wear a 7.5 in heels, but ordered a 7. It was a perfect fit. I definitely recommend this if you want a beautiful shoe, but a low heel. They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Clark

customer_reviews.title: Loved them!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wedding and glittered them with modge podge. They fit perfectly and we're beautiful even before the glitter!!
customer_reviews.author: cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Overall some of the best shoes I've purchased
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! The color is gorgeous and perfect, the embellishments are beautiful! Plus they came with free gel inserts, heel grips, and replacement heel tips. They fit perfectly and are a super comfortable height heel. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty went well with my daughter sweet 16 dress
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I only wore these for a short time before I had to take them off and figure something else out because my toe hurt so bad.
customer_reviews.text: These fit well, but my toes were crunched. Maybe because I am a bigger girl (220 lbs) but my big toe was rubbed raw from the toe hole rubbing my skin. I only wore these for a short time before I had to take them off and figure something else out because my toe hurt so bad.
customer_reviews.author: christyb17

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE. They were beautiful for the event
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE. They were beautiful for the event. The attached details are not very tight and I imagine they might fall off easily, but I'm not planning on wearing these on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wear with my wedding dress and I’m so excited. They’re perfect and COMFORTABLE! They even came with sticky pads to add the comfort. The pink is pinker than I had expected but it’s so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and very nice looking. but run big
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very elegant. Worth the money. The material and quality are good. The shoes came with gel inserts for the heels and the front part, which is a nice touch. The shoes do run big so order a 1/2 size smaller. I wear 7.5 US, and I ordered these in 7. They are still loos actually but with the inserts, the shoes fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Ishak

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are perfect but piece is loose
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes they are for my wedding I have a perfect fit alil tight want the back open notice piece is loose
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes and color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes and color. I’m normally a 9.5 in heels but ordered a 9 after reading reviews. Feel a little too tight. Hoping the 10 is the right size because I want these as my wedding shoes! They do need a little wearing in because the bottoms are pretty slick.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri N.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes
customer_reviews.text: The jewels on the shoe really sparkle beautifully. Not cheaply made. Will need to break in a little before I wear them on my wedding day but wonderfully made, don’t pinch in any areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful and I cannot wait to wear them on my wedding day. The Navy Blue color is rich and jewels on the side are elegant. I was very surprised that the shoes came with Gel cushions, heel grips and heel replacements!! I definitely recommend these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Michelle DeNoewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely pair of heels. As mom of the groom they have just the right amount of sparkle! They were the perfect shoe for my outfit.
customer_reviews.author: DWyb

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, good quality for the money, plan to wear it on my wedding this summer. I have wide feet and it feels very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Jelena Vojinovic

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size and stones are cheap
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 6 and it is not true size. It's way too loose. Also it seems to be cheaply made. The stones are loose and looked to be sewn on after the fact and one snag would rip them off.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Church

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe. Too bad it way small for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe. Too bad it way small for me. I wear an 8.5 or 9, in general, depending on brand. Have normal feet, not wide by any means. Size 9 was way too small for me. Could not even put it on at all , as the shoe is rather rigid form. Look good otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our nieces wedding and absolutely loved them! Very comfortable and even came with an extra set of heel bottoms and a cushion to put around the back to keep them from slipping off.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra E. Ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shoe for a wedding and it was very comfortable. The fit was good and and heal was not too high.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina J. Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes. The fit was perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. The fit was perfect, UNTIL, you have to walk in them. They slide like hell. Glad I had a back-up pair of shoes for my sons wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Bettye

customer_reviews.title: They include heel grips. A little big.
customer_reviews.text: Very Pretty, they were a little big but they add heel grips which once in the shoe they fit fine. These are a little painful around the toe area though. Hoping they can get broken in after a few wears.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Noland

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! I really wanted these to fit but even with the heel grips, my foot kept slipping out.
customer_reviews.author: J Linsell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for something different for my wedding and they are BEAUTIFUL! They came with foot pads and heel pads which was a great extra. Very comfortable (and I don't usually wear heels). I can't wait for my special day to wear them. The picture is pretty but the shoes are even prettier in person.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Milmine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are gorgeous! I am so excited to wear them for my wedding! They are comfortable, shiny satin and gorgeous rhinestones! Exactly what I was looking for and so budget friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: They fit as expected and are pretty. Seem tight with the gel inserts so i ...
customer_reviews.text: havent worn them yet. They fit as expected and are pretty. Seem tight with the gel inserts so i probably won't wear them. May on the arch of foot, but not sure yet. Wedding isn't for a year. I probably should wear them to break them in a bit. Anyway they did fit.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful purple
customer_reviews.text: I love these !! They came with extra heel / ball cushion, replacement heel tips , the shoes are beautiful Toe box it great & I have fat toes !! The color of that purple is amazing
customer_reviews.author: patsy

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Buckle not even attached on either shoe, sole so thin it doesn't support any weight. Can not even wear them. Waste of money but for as long as it took to get them there was no use even trying to get my money back. Expensive lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prefect
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove . My wife has a tiny foot (size 3) and we finally found a pretty shoe for her to get married in.
customer_reviews.author: Woodlin D Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shoes
customer_reviews.text: The most gorgeous shoes I own. So sophisticated and comfortable. They fit just right and the design is perfect for a special occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Capo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wedding shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are just as pretty as in the photo and for heals, comfortable. They were nicely packaged in their box and arrived in perfect condition. I can’t wait to wear them on my wedding day.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lange

customer_reviews.title: Elegant shoes, great price!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were perfect for my wedding! I have wide feet and ordered my regular size 11 and this fit perfectly. They were not too tight for me.
customer_reviews.author: Niambi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! True to size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wedding & expected not to like them as much as I do but they blew all my expectations! The heel is perfect height so I can wear them all day and be comfortable! And the bling on them makes them that much better Absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Espericueta

customer_reviews.title: According to her they fit perfectly & felt comfortable, for the little bit of time she had ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes haven't been worn yet as they are for my daughter's wedding. According to her they fit perfectly & felt comfortable, for the little bit of time she had them on. They are an exceptional value for the price. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wore these at her HS PROM!! She was stunning!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very dressy and elegant and just the right shade of ...
customer_reviews.text: Very dressy and elegant and just the right shade of blush for my son's upcoming wedding. I wanted something with a little bling for the special occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 7 and bought a 7 and I love them so much .. they are a little bigger than I thought they would be. They did however send arch lifts and insoles with them. How great is that!?! They are beautiful! For the price I couldn’t go wrong !
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were the most comfortable I've worn to date
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my wedding. They fell within my budget and exactly the style i wanted. What you see is what you get. Shoes were the most comfortable I've worn to date.
customer_reviews.author: ReyeN

customer_reviews.title: cheaper quality
customer_reviews.text: these shoes were not comfortable at all, nor did they fit correctly. the stones were also attached to the shoe by a chain. not the look i was going for
customer_reviews.author: anasemon

customer_reviews.title: Classy af
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THESE SHOES!!! The pics dont do them justice. They are so beautiful! I'm usually a size 8 1/2 but got the 9 after reading reviews. They fit perfect and very easy to walk in. Cant wait to wear them on my wedding day 💖
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are beautiful. And will be amazing wedding shoes. The detail in the jewls is gorgeous. They also fit as expected and the additional foot pads and heel support provided was a great additional surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Quinton-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe. Wearing for my wedding
customer_reviews.text: Jewels loose upon arrival. Beautiful shoe. Wearing for my wedding.
customer_reviews.author: CDJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look great. Blue is very vibrant dark navy color. Wife is very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit well.  Beautiful.  Nice size heel for wedding day.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it due to my own mistake because I needed ivory and not white but otherwise it fit well and will be beautiful on the foot of the bride!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mccurdy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot wait to wear these shoes at my wedding! They fit perfectly. They will need to be a little stretched out as any heel does. Beautiful shoe that didn't cost a fortune!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: I got it for my wedding and I am super impressed with these for an online buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in a size 10--I am normally either a 9.5 or 10 and it fits perfectly! I got it for my wedding and I am super impressed with these for an online buy. They are comfortable (which is a lot coming from me because I rarely wear heels) and they come with pads and new pegs for the bottom of the heels if they get damaged. Highly recommend! They are a bit more pink than they are in the photo, but not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: I had to send these shoes back when I receive ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to send these shoes back when I receive them they fit perfectly I just couldn't use them for what I wanted them for .
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE beautiful heels.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were absolutely stunning in person. I think they got even more attention than my wedding dress! We did a walk-about-town photo shoot, and I got zero blisters or pain either. Thank you so much for making such a beautiful, affordable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: W. Meatball

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were perfect! The right color, the right fit, and they had all these extras I have never seen come in a shoe box. Very happy with this purchase and they came right on time and matched perfectly with my bouquet! Highly reccommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Young

product_meta.title: ElegantPark Wedding Heels Peep Toe Wedding Shoes for Bride High Heels Rhinestones Bridal Shoes Satin Evening Party Prom Dress Shoes Pumps
product_meta.description:
Colored wedding prom shoes, sparkly rhinestones design make the shoes more charming and elegant.ElegantPark provided varied women dress shoes such as heels, pumps, platforms, sandals, straps, wedges, flats, boots and more, and related matching wedding accessories, like shoe clips, tote bag, brooch pins and etc.

The size chart for these wedding pumps

EU 35 = US 4 (true fitting 5 US )
EU 36 = US 5 (true fitting 6 US)
EU 37 = US 6 (true fitting 6.5 US)
EU 38 = US 7
EU 39 = US 8
EU 40 = US 9 
EU 41 = US 10 
EU 42 = US 11 

Warm Tips: Because of the conversion issue between the EU and US size, recently we have provided tips for some sizes according to our customer size fitting experience, if you have any question, please contact us. 

We provide custom-made service for these pumps to meet your special request, if you want different heels, different colors or other different inquire, BEFORE YOUR ORDER, please contact our customer service and they will confirm and guide you how to make this special order, OTHERWISE will you still receive standard shoes and non-custom-made.
feature_bullets: 3" heel height bridal shoes for women
High heel pumps ivory wedding shoes for bride
Peep toe wedding pumps for bride shoes
D'orsay wedding heels for women with rhinestones

Warm Tips: Because of the conversion issue between the EU and US size, recently we have provided tips for some sizes according to our customer size fitting experience, if you have any question, please contact us.
